name: Winter Taxi Parking Simulator - taxi driver games,parking games
name_original: Winter Taxi Parking Simulator - taxi driver games,parking games
description:
Winter Taxi Parking Simulator

Get to experience how it feels being a real Winter Taxi Driver!
Racing games, city driving games are not new on board. High speeds, the driving adventures and challenging missions give thrill and extreme fun.
Parking games and taxi driving simulator of 2016 games are played much and this is a crazy fun experience of cabby through the city rush.
Drive realistic van to pick up passengers on snow mountains with tourist.
Play as a cool driver and enjoy around the live snow fall mountains.
Provide transport to the public passengers and let them experience your craziest driving through big city traffic.
It is fantastic major rush mission in beautiful weather with snowfall.
You can improve your driving skills for driving luxury and latest ride. Your transportaion. Your rules.Your Speed, drift and whip around corners, weave through traffic, up ramps and into the air.

You have multiple game play missions in hilly off road conditions to complete so be ready for the kicks and excitement.
It's crazy how the city lives - people are walking, cars are crossing. Get in your taxi, fasten your seat belts and become a city traffic racer.
It’s your ride, your speed and so is your rules of driving. Drift and skid on tight corners, overtake the other cars, slide on the snow.
It’s a taxi mania of pick and drop. You have a free access to the taxi driving experience on your android.

Fast as asphalt, racing on the roads steering away the buildings, the taxi simulation is fun.
City Cab Driver and Simulator is next generation 3D driving simulator game for people who love driving fast sports taxis and cars with

realistic graphics and amazing gameplay.

Play as new cabbie in town you got some super cars in your parking lot.
Show taxi rush with your taxi driving skills without getting damaged to priceless sports cabs.
The less you bump the sooner you will get awesome customized vehicles playing this crazy modern taxi driver simulator 3d game.
You will experience both city and off-road environment and view many scenic views of mountains and hills while you are driving in the

snowy conditions.Drive the Taxi driver 3D Snow season away!

Advantages:

• Minor improve of city levels
• Beautiful city scenarios
• Simple but colorful and fast graphics rendering
• No extra permissions needed for installation
• Easy quit from game
• Freedom mode for every level

How to Play:

• Have control over the accelerator and monitor your cab by left and right buttons.
• Use the map for your guide.
• Be smart and choose the best possible short route to get your passengers to their destinyFeatures of Winter Taxi Parking Simulator:

Taxi parking - park your taxi
Exciting taxi driving missions and level progressions
Animated people entering/exiting the TAXI
Collect all the luxury racing taxi cabs in this taxi driver simulator for unlimited fun
Extreme precision driving simulator
Beautiful new environment
Rich colors and graphic
Great sound
Smooth control

Enjoy the Winter Taxi Parking Simulator......
